◆ keyMask

uint32_t nbgl_keyboard_s::keyMask

mask used to disable some keys in letters only mod. The 26 LSB bits of mask are used, for the 26 letters of a QWERTY keyboard. Bit[0] for Q, Bit[1] for W and so on
